mdRecord.dcterms:title: Vervtex soap tissues dispenser
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Burlington Soap Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Artifact was used at the Kluge Children's Rehabilitation Center; featured in a 2008 exhibit at the Claude Moore Health Sciences Library on hand washing and public health.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical supplies
